rationale: G3 is not fully locked - P1 elements still open
24h oracle not run in steady state
Tuning before baseline frozen = audit poison
FRICTION-001 may indicate hypothesis quality + regime sensitivity, not calibration error
Damper tuning now risks masking structural cause (false improvement)

required_conditions: 24h oracle run at least once without deviation
Single commit identified as nullpoint baseline
execution_gate.post_g3_action: Run UMA loop again to verify FRICTION-001 reproduces

ceo_governance_correction.ceo_principle: Ikke gjør irreversible endringer før G3 = låst

frictions.description: Poor prediction accuracy indicated by high brier scores and low hit rates, suggesting weak hypothesis formation that reduces validated signals.
Infrastructure completion but delays in cycle execution, causing validation pipeline slowdowns that extend time from hypothesis to validation.
evidence_quotes: Headline: Day 7 FINAL: LDOW + ADR-024 Infrastructure Complete - Awaiting Cycle Execution

recommendations.proposed_action: Tune the confidence_damper_alpha and confidence_damper_beta parameters to calibrate model predictions and reduce brier scores, improving hypothesis quality within the low-risk auto-G1 scope.
